alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 25 at 2:15AM MDT until October 27 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures in the mid to upper 20s. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
